alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:49PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lawrence County through 215 PM MDT... At 149 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Black Fox Campground, or 11 miles south of Lead, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne Crossing, Brownsville and Terry Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
